overview: Tosan Arueyingho is the founder and CEO of Knowdeology, a New York based start-up that allows users share educative knowledge over a social platform. Prior to founding Knowdeology, Tosan Arueyingho worked in the publishing industry as a media-tech editor for Macmillan Mcgraw-Hill and a Production Director for a New York based magazine, JTON Magazine. Tosan Arueyingho is also currently an Economics/Industrial Engineering major at Columbia University in New York City.
